entry.title: TrueUSD Moves $1B in Reserves To The Bahamas After U.S. Banking Failures
entry.summary: The company behind TrueUSD, the fifth-largest stablecoin, moved $1B of the company’s reserve assets to a Bahamas-based financial institution citing the tumultuous state of the U.S. banking sector on Wednesday. Archblock, the firm that oversees TrueUSD’s $2B in reserve assets, moved the funds to Capital Union Bank. The Bahamas-based bank now holds $1.4B of the […]

entry.title: Uniswap v3 Launches On BNB Chain After Months of Infighting
entry.summary: Uniswap, the leading decentralized exchange, went live on BNB Chain following months of infighting on Wednesday. Uniswap Labs announced the launch of its v3 protocol on BNB Chain, saying the blockchain “typically offers faster and cheaper transactions than Ethereum,” making the exchange accessible to a broader user base. BNB Chain, a blockchain created by the […]

entry.title: How Top Stablecoins Depegged After The Second Largest US Bank Failure

Today we’re looking back over the wild weekend and figuring out what a depegged stablecoin and failing banks could signal for DeFi.
